pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā upaṭṭhākakulaṃ thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:1.6: Tena kho pana samayena tassa kulassa gharaṃ ḍayhati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:1.8: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā amhākaṃ deyyadhammaṃ antarāyaṃ karissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:1.9: Ubhayenāmha paribāhirā bhogehi ca puññena cā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:1.10: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:1.11: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:1.12: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ karissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:1.13: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ akāsī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:1.16: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ karissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:1.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:1.19: “Yā pana bhikkhunī gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:2.1.8: channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchimaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:2.1.10: “kathaṃ ime cīvaraṃ na dadeyyun”ti antarāyaṃ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:2.1.11: Aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ antarāyaṃ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc26:2.1.12: Sambahulānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā anupasampannāya vā cīvaraṃ vā aññaṃ vā parikkhāraṃ antarāyaṃ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
